/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft light of day. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the urban landscape. The sky above is a hazy gray, perhaps due to pollution or fog, adding a somewhat moody atmosphere to the scene. Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a certain tranquility to the image, as if inviting the viewer to take a leisurely stroll down the street and explore the city at their own pace.
